title: Ordered sums in a magma
content: The symbol ` gsum ` is mostly used in the context of abelian groups. Therefore, it is called "group sum". It can be defined, however, in arbitrary magmas. If the magma is not required to be commutative or associative, then the order of the summands and the order in which summations are done become important. If the magma is not unital, then one cannot define a meaningful empty sum. See Remark 2. in the comment for ~ df-gsum .

blocks.name: gsumvalx
blocks.content: Expand out the substitutions in ~ df-gsum . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: gsumval
blocks.content: Expand out the substitutions in ~ df-gsum . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Dec-2014.)

thm gsumval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), cif(c3, cif(cio(s0, wex(s1, wrex(s2, cfv(cuz, cv(s1)), wa(wceq(c4, co(cv(s1), cfz, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cseq(cv(s1), c5, c1), cv(s2))))))), cio(s0, wex(s3, wa(wf1o(cv(s3), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c6)), c6), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cseq(nat1, c5, ccom(c1, cv(s3))), cfv(chash, c6)))))), wcel(c4, crn(cfz))), wss(crn(c1), c2))))
  -| wceq(c7, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, crab(s4, c7, wral(s5, c7, wa(wceq(co(cv(s4), c5, cv(s5)), cv(s5)), wceq(co(cv(s5), c5, cv(s4)), cv(s5))))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c6, cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c9))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c4, c7))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsc(s4, c5)
  -| diffsc(s4, c7)
  -| diffsc(s5, c5)
  -| diffsc(s5, c7)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
} = {
  gsumvalx(s0, s1, s2, s3, s4, s5, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, c8, universe, w0)
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(c1, universe), wf(c1, c4, c7), wcel(c4, c9), wcel(c7, universe))
  a1i(w0, wcel(c7, universe))
  fvexi(c7, cbs, c0)
  fex2(c1, c4, c7, c9, universe)
  fdmd(c1, c4, c7, w0)
}

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum]c1)= if(ran(c1)‚äÜ c2, c3, if(c4 ‚àà ran(...), iota(s0, ‚àÉ(s1, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` s1),(c4 =(s1[...]s2)‚àß s0 =(seq(s1(c5, c1))` s2))))), iota(s0, ‚àÉ(s3,((s3 :(1[...](# ` c6))‚Üî c6)‚àß s0 =(seq(1(c5,(c1 ‚àò s3)))`(# ` c6))))))))

blocks.name: gsumpropd
blocks.content: The group sum depends only on the base set and additive operation. Note that for entirely unrestricted functions, there can be dependency on out-of-domain values of the operation, so this is somewhat weaker than ~ mndpropd etc. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 18-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: gsumpropd2
blocks.content: A stronger version of ~ gsumpropd , working for magma, where only the closure of the addition operation on a common base is required, see ~ gsummgmpropd . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Jun-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumpropd2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c2, cgsu, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0)))), wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(w0, wfun(c1))
  -| wi(w0, wss(crn(c1), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  gsumpropd2lem(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, crab(s0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))), cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, crab(s0, cfv(cbs, c2), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, c2), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))), w0)
  eqid(cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, crab(s0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))))
  eqid(cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, crab(s0, cfv(cbs, c2), wral(s1, cfv(cbs, c2), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsumpropd2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum]c1)=(c2[gsum]c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(Base ` c0)=(Base ` c2))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚àß s1 ‚àà(Base ` c0)))‚Üí(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)‚àà(Base ` c0))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚àß s1 ‚àà(Base ` c0)))‚Üí(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(+ ` c2)]s1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí Fun(c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ran(c1)‚äÜ(Base ` c0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  gsumpropd2lem(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, (`' c1 "(ùïå \ { s0 ‚àà(Base ` c0)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(Base ` c0),((s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[(+ ` c0)]s0)= s1))})), (`' c1 "(ùïå \ { s0 ‚àà(Base ` c2)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(Base ` c2),((s0[(+ ` c2)]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[(+ ` c2)]s0)= s1))})), w0)
  eqid((`' c1 "(ùïå \ { s0 ‚àà(Base ` c0)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(Base ` c0),((s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[(+ ` c0)]s0)= s1))})))
  eqid((`' c1 "(ùïå \ { s0 ‚àà(Base ` c2)| ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(Base ` c2),((s0[(+ ` c2)]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[(+ ` c2)]s0)= s1))})))
}

blocks.name: gsummgmpropd
blocks.content: A stronger version of ~ gsumpropd if at least one of the involved structures is a magma, see ~ gsumpropd2 . (Contributed by AV, 31-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsummgmpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), co(c2, cgsu, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cmgm))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(s1))))
  -| wi(w0, wfun(c1))
  -| wi(w0, wss(crn(c1), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  gsumpropd2(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  imp(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  syl(w0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0))), wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cfv(cbs, c0))), wcel(c0, cmgm))
  3expib(wcel(c0, cmgm), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(s1)), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  mgmcl(c0, cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c0), cv(s1), cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm gsummgmpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum]c1)=(c2[gsum]c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(Base ` c0)=(Base ` c2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Mgm)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚àß s1 ‚àà(Base ` c0)))‚Üí(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)=(s0[(+ ` c2)]s1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí Fun(c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ran(c1)‚äÜ(Base ` c0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  gsumpropd2(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  imp(w0, (s0 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚àß s1 ‚àà(Base ` c0)), (s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)‚àà(Base ` c0))
  syl(w0, ((s0 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚àß s1 ‚àà(Base ` c0))‚Üí(s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)‚àà(Base ` c0)), c0 ‚àà Mgm)
  3expib(c0 ‚àà Mgm, s0 ‚àà(Base ` c0), s1 ‚àà(Base ` c0), (s0[(+ ` c0)]s1)‚àà(Base ` c0))
  mgmcl(c0, s0, (Base ` c0), s1, (+ ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((+ ` c0))
}

blocks.name: gsumress
blocks.content: The group sum in a substructure is the same as the group sum in the original structure. The only requirement on the substructure is that it contain the identity element; neither ` G ` nor ` H ` need be groups. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm gsumress(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9, wff w0) {

  -| wceq(c2, co(c0, cress, c5))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c7, c8))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c5, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, c7, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c9, c5))

} = {

  ifbieq12d(cfv(c0g, c0), cif(cio(hs3, wex(hs1, wrex(hs2, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), wa(wceq(c7, co(cv(hs1), cfz, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs3), cfv(cseq(cv(hs1), c4, c1), cv(hs2))))))), cio(hs3, wex(hs4, wa(wf1o(cv(hs4), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, csn(c9))))), cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, csn(c9)))), wceq(cv(hs3), cfv(cseq(nat1, c4, ccom(c1, cv(hs4))), cfv(chash, cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, csn(c9))))))))), wcel(c7, crn(cfz))), cfv(c0g, c2), cif(cio(hs3, wex(hs1, wrex(hs2, cfv(cuz, cv(hs1)), wa(wceq(c7, co(cv(hs1), cfz, cv(hs2))), wceq(cv(hs3), cfv(cseq(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c2), c1), cv(hs2))))))), cio(hs3, wex(hs4, wa(wf1o(cv(hs4), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, csn(c9))))), cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, csn(c9)))), wceq(cv(hs3), cfv(cseq(nat1, cfv(cplusg, c2), ccom(c1, cv(hs4))), cfv(chash, cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, csn(c9))))))))), wcel(c7, crn(cfz))), w0, wss(crn(c1), crab(hs0, c3, wral(s0, c3, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))))), wss(crn(c1), crab(hs0, cfv(cbs, c2), wral(s0, cfv(cbs, c2), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))))))
  sseq2d(crn(c1), crab(hs0, c3, wral(s0, c3, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))))), crab(hs0, cfv(cbs, c2), wral(s0, cfv(cbs, c2), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c2), cv(hs0)), cv(s0))))), w0)

thm gsumval1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {

} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cgsu, c1), c2, cif(c2, cif(cio(hs2, wex(hs0, wrex(hs1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)), wa(wceq(c7, co(cv(hs0), cfz, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cseq(cv(hs0), c4, c1), cv(hs1))))))), cio(hs2, wex(hs3, wa(wf1o(cv(hs3), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, c5)))), cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, c5))), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cseq(nat1, c4, ccom(c1, cv(hs3))), cfv(chash, cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, c5)))))))), wcel(c7, crn(cfz))), wss(crn(c1), c5)), w0)
  gsumval(hs2, hs0, hs1, hs3, s0, s1, c0, c1, c5, c2, c7, c4, cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, c5)), c3, c6, c8, w0)
  eqidd(cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, c5)), w0)
  sylancl(w0, wf(c1, c7, c3), wf(c1, c7, c5), wss(c5, c3))
  ssrab3(s0, c5, c3, wral(s1, c3, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))
  fss(c1, c7, c5, c3)
  3syl(w0, wceq(cif(c2, cif(cio(hs2, wex(hs0, wrex(hs1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)), wa(wceq(c7, co(cv(hs0), cfz, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cseq(cv(hs0), c4, c1), cv(hs1))))))), cio(hs2, wex(hs3, wa(wf1o(cv(hs3), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, c5)))), cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, c5))), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cseq(nat1, c4, ccom(c1, cv(hs3))), cfv(chash, cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, c5)))))))), wcel(c7, crn(cfz))), wss(crn(c1), c5)), c2), wf(c1, c7, c5), wss(crn(c1), c5))

  diff.hs2.s(hs0)

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum]c1)= c2)

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c7 ‚àà c8)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c1 : c7 ‚Üí c5))

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
} = {
  eqtrd((c0[gsum]c1), c2, if(ran(c1)‚äÜ c5, c2, if(c7 ‚àà ran(...), iota(hs2, ‚àÉ(hs0, ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` hs0),(c7 =(hs0[...]hs1)‚àß hs2 =(seq(hs0(c4, c1))` hs1))))), iota(hs2, ‚àÉ(hs3,((hs3 :(1[...](# `(`' c1 "(ùïå \ c5))))‚Üî(`' c1 "(ùïå \ c5)))‚àß hs2 =(seq(1(c4,(c1 ‚àò hs3)))`(# `(`' c1 "(ùïå \ c5))))))))), w0)
  gsumval(hs2, hs0, hs1, hs3, s0, s1, c0, c1, c5, c2, c7, c4, (`' c1 "(ùïå \ c5)), c3, c6, c8, w0)
  eqidd((`' c1 "(ùïå \ c5)), w0)
  sylancl(w0, (c1 : c7 ‚Üí c3), (c1 : c7 ‚Üí c5), c5 ‚äÜ c3)
  ssrab3(s0, c5, c3, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c3,((s0[c4]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c4]s0)= s1)))
  fss(c1, c7, c5, c3)
  3syl(w0, if(ran(c1)‚äÜ c5, c2, if(c7 ‚àà ran(...), iota(hs2, ‚àÉ(hs0, ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` hs0),(c7 =(hs0[...]hs1)‚àß hs2 =(seq(hs0(c4, c1))` hs1))))), iota(hs2, ‚àÉ(hs3,((hs3 :(1[...](# `(`' c1 "(ùïå \ c5))))‚Üî(`' c1 "(ùïå \ c5)))‚àß hs2 =(seq(1(c4,(c1 ‚àò hs3)))`(# `(`' c1 "(ùïå \ c5)))))))))= c2, (c1 : c7 ‚Üí c5), ran(c1)‚äÜ c5)
  frn(c1, c7, c5)
  iftrue(c2, if(c7 ‚àà ran(...), iota(hs2, ‚àÉ(hs0, ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà(‚Ñ§‚â• ` hs0),(c7 =(hs0[...]hs1)‚àß hs2 =(seq(hs0(c4, c1))` hs1))))), iota(hs2, ‚àÉ(hs3,((hs3 :(1[...](# `(`' c1 "(ùïå \ c5))))‚Üî(`' c1 "(ùïå \ c5)))‚àß hs2 =(seq(1(c4,(c1 ‚àò hs3)))`(# `(`' c1 "(ùïå \ c5)))))))), ran(c1)‚äÜ c5)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)

  gsumval1(hs0, hs1, c0, emptycls, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cplusg, c0), crab(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))), universe, emptycls, universe, wcel(c0, universe))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))

  eqid(crab(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))))
  id(wcel(c0, universe))

  0ex()
  a1i(wcel(c0, universe), wf(emptycls, emptycls, crab(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))))))
  f0(crab(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), wral(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))))
  eqtr4d(co(c0, cgsu, emptycls), c1, emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))

  df-gsum(hs2, hs3, hs0, hs1, hs4, hs5, hs6, hs7)

thm gsumval2a(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), cfv(cseq(c2, c3, c1), c4)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cfv(cuz, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, co(c2, cfz, c4), c5))
  -| wceq(c7, crab(s0, c5, wral(s1, c5, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wss(crn(c1), c7)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), cfv(cseq(c2, c3, c1), c4))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), cfv(cseq(c2, c3, c1), c4))), diffsc(s0, c6))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cgsu, c1), cfv(cseq(c2, c3, c1), c4))), diffsc(s1, c0))
  eqtrd(co(c0, cgsu, c1), cfv(cseq(c2, c3, c1), c4), cio(hs2, wex(hs0, wrex(hs1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)), wa(wceq(co(c2, cfz, c4), co(cv(hs0), cfz, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cseq(cv(hs0), c3, c1), cv(hs1))))))), w0)
  eqtrd(co(c0, cgsu, c1), cio(hs2, wex(hs0, wrex(hs1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)), wa(wceq(co(c2, cfz, c4), co(cv(hs0), cfz, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cseq(cv(hs0), c3, c1), cv(hs1))))))), cif(cfv(c0g, c0), cif(cio(hs2, wex(hs0, wrex(hs1, cfv(cuz, cv(hs0)), wa(wceq(co(c2, cfz, c4), co(cv(hs0), cfz, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cseq(cv(hs0), c3, c1), cv(hs1))))))), cio(hs2, wex(hs3, wa(wf1o(cv(hs3), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, c7)))), cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, c7))), wceq(cv(hs2), cfv(cseq(nat1, c3, ccom(c1, cv(hs3))), cfv(chash, cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, c7)))))))), wcel(co(c2, cfz, c4), crn(cfz))), wss(crn(c1), c7)), w0)
  gsumval(hs2, hs0, hs1, hs3, s0, s1, c0, c1, c7, cfv(c0g, c0), co(c2, cfz, c4), c3, cima(ccnv(c1), cdif(universe, c7)), c5, c6, universe, w0)
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))

blocks.content: Value of the group sum operation over a finite set of sequential integers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Dec-2014.)

  mpbird(w0, wf(c1, co(c2, cfz, co(c2, caddc, nat1)), c5), wf(c1, cpr(c2, c4), c5))
  feq2d(c1, co(c2, cfz, co(c2, caddc, nat1)), c5, cpr(c2, c4), w0)
  eqtrd(co(c2, cfz, co(c2, caddc, nat1)), cpr(c2, c4), cpr(c2, co(c2, caddc, nat1)), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(co(c2, cfz, co(c2, caddc, nat1)), cpr(c2, co(c2, caddc, nat1))), wcel(c2, cz))
  fzpr(c2)
  preq2d(c2, co(c2, caddc, nat1), c4, w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c2, c3, c1), co(c2, caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(cseq(c2, c3, c1), c2), c3, cfv(c1, co(c2, caddc, nat1)))), wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, c2)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, c2)), wcel(c2, cz))
  uzid(c2)
  seqp1(c2, c2, c3, c1)
  oveq12d(cfv(cseq(c2, c3, c1), c2), c3, cfv(c1, co(c2, caddc, nat1)), cfv(c1, c2), cfv(c1, c4), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c2, c3, c1), c2), cfv(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, cz))
  seq1(c2, c3, c1)
  fveq2d(c1, co(c2, caddc, nat1), c4, w0)
  eqcomd(co(c2, caddc, nat1), c4, w0)
}
